title: K/DA POPSTARS MUSIC VIDEO PARODY

embed.description: biggay.wav -- Hello! Weird video? I made this for a Photography Class Project. We were allowed to do any music video... so... yeah. This happened. All footage is original, but the song is clearly not. -- "K/DA POPSTARS" is owned by Riot Games.

body:
I would like your honest opinion. Of course, most of this is purely comical and not be taken seriously.
{{champion:103}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:28}} im so sorry for making this rito

What to take from the video:
- The Macarena fits with the song.
- Flashy effects = good video.
- Kicking as/s is funny.
- No one likes parodies.

Edit: Okay the title wording is a bit off. Itâ€™s more of a personal represention or a comical recreation rather than a parody. Sorry for the click bait oops
